data.name: Frontend Developer
data.title: Frontend Developer & Intern
content: As part of my education at {{Erhversakademi Aarhus}} I worked at an internship at Cernel.ai, where i worked as a {{frontend developer}} alongside another frontend developer and a bunch of very talented backend engineers.

I worked on the frontend of the Cernel.ai platform, which is a platform that allows E-Commerce companies to instantly generate {{AI generated product descriptions}}, titles and other SEO fields for their products and categories.

I worked primarily with {{React}} and {{Next}} when developing and implementing new features, such as {{Stripe integration}}, {{new onboarding flows}} and a {{big customization feature}} that allows users to customize the {{AI generated content}}.

As Cernel is a {{startup}}, I also had the opportunity to work on the {{UX}} and {{Design}} part of the implementation, where I worked with Figma to design new features and improvements to the platform.
